scripts.check: ultracite check && bun run syncpack:check && bun run check-types
scripts.update:all: for file in package.json apps/*/package.json packages/*/package.json; do [ -f "$file" ] && bunx npm-check-updates -u --packageFile "$file" --reject 'react,react-dom,@types/react,expo,expo-*,react-native,react-native-*,@react-navigation/*' || true; done && bun install && (cd apps/native && echo 'y' | bunx expo install --fix || true) && bun install && bun run syncpack:fix
scripts.cl-install: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'bun.lock' -type f -delete && bun install
